entities.name: madam malkin
entities.description: Madam Malkin is the one who is trying to adjust Malfoy's robes. She dithers for a moment before deciding to act as though nothing is happening in the hope that it won't. She bends towards Malfoy.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is the one who is getting his robes adjusted by Madam Malkin. He is glaring at Harry and slapping Madam Malkin's hand away when she tries to adjust his sleeve.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who Malfoy is glaring at. There is no further description of Harry in this passage.

entities.name: narcissa
entities.description: Narcissa is Malfoy's mother. She says that she doesn't think Malfoy wants the robes anymore with a contemptuous tone.

relationships.description: Madam Malkin is adjusting Malfoy's robes.
